website_summaries.verdict: I like the design of this simple programmable thermostat, but its low temperature reading and humming sound make it hard to recommend.
pros: The $25 Hunter 44157 thermostat hides all of its clutter under a convenient plastic case
Its blue backlight makes the display easier to read in low-light conditions
cons: This thermostat's ambient temperature reading was consistently 2 degrees lower than the four competitors I tested alongside it
I heard a faint, but distinct humming sound every time I pressed a button

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Hunter Thermostat as we just moved and I didn't bother uninstalling from the old place because they're so inexpensive. We only use it for heating so install was super simple if you pay attention to your wiring. Comes with little stickers to mark your wires which would be easier to use if they were longer. Our stickers fell off before I even had the back plate installed! Can't imagine it would be difficult to install for use with central air if you have the basic knowledge of your system.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Gwen

customer_reviews.title: HOLD does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Just like many others have stated, the permanent override via the HOLD button only acts as a temporary hold and reverts to the programmed setting once the next time setting has been reached. Replaced my older version of the same unit that I had for almost 20 years with this one and am very disappointed. If you need to use the HOLD feature, stay away from this unit. I can't believe they are allowed to sell this with what, buy now, is an obvious flaw in the unit's internal programming. I'll get better use out of this as a range target.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid feature set, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is full-featured at a good price. Not only does it have 4 time periods per day, and separate settings for weekends, but it has a settable "span," to determine how many degrees to go below and above the set temperature before switching on or off. A wider span can avoid cycling your furnace or pellet stove too fast. Other thermostats this price lack that feature. It also can be set to ramp between settings, rather than suddenly change them at the set times. Definitely requires reading the manual. The controls will not make sense without it. Several switches on the back which have to be set right for your system before putting it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: whit

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & easy to use programmable thermostat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older but similar model (44155C) Hunter thermostat. Only giving it 4 stars since the back light failed on the previous one after a couple of years and it would not maintain programming, resulting in my heat not turning on. I replaced with a similar model since other brands available locally required me to drill additional holes in the wall and left a gap where this thermostat had been installed. Am hoping this one will last more than 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: sooteal

customer_reviews.title: The Setpoint Changes While in the HOLD Mode
customer_reviews.text: I operate my thermostats manually....meaning, I place the stat in hold and manually adjust the desired temp. I placed this stat in the heat mode and set the temperature for 50 degrees. The very next day, the set temp changed (itself) to 68 degrees....I set it back to 50. Today, the stat set temp changed (itself) to 76 degrees.....once again, the stat was in the HOLD mode! I cannot trust this BRAND NEW thermostat to heat my empty summer home through the winter....this $17 stat could cost me hundreds more in utility costs. BTW....customer support is terrible....you get an answering service and no call back.
customer_reviews.author: kc5dvg

customer_reviews.title: Will stick with Hunter always!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Honeywell after I got my first hunter thermostat wet while removing wallpaper, I got 1 year out of that piece of garbage, so I went back to this hunter. I can tell the difference already as far as constant even temperature theirs no lag time in calling for heat I didn’t realize their was until I installed this thermostat. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only a year, difficult interface.
customer_reviews.text: Three things wrong with this Hunter thermostat. 1) Programming it is difficult, but you can do it, 2) You can manually override the programming if you want to, but it doesn't seem to stay where you want it - it constantly reverts to the programming; even following the steps in the operation manual does not stop it. 3) After a year of use, it started cycling the heater off and on once in a while The cycling kept getting worse and worse, until last night; I listened to it clicking on and off for ten minutes and I finally just shut it off. I cannot recommend this thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: aaron e.

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: After my son installed it, the programmable setting did not work. You could turn the air conditioner on and off by hand, but that was it. I figured he installed it incorrectly. This week I had service from a furnace repair company and they checked the thermostat thoroughly. Told me the programming NEVER WORKED on the item. So I wasted my money and missed the return window because I thought it was a problem on my end. Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Catiekk

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but...
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement of another Hunter unit that lasted about a year and a half. This one, unlike the original, does not return to the programmed temp after a manual change, and even changes the programmed temp at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: TheTimeRider

customer_reviews.title: Hunter use to be good.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return do to a humming noise it made when you touched any of the buttons. Had problem with 2nd one. Tried to talk to a Hunter technician for weeks. Finally got a secretary who told me I could return it to them for a replacement. When I finally got the information to do so, they wanted to charge me $25 for shipping. So just dealing with the hum until we find another thermostat we like.
customer_reviews.author: kktaylor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hook up in OLD house
customer_reviews.text: The 2 wire connection that runs the furnace in this over-100-yr-old addition to the 200 year old house does not go with most directions. I don't have AC (not possible with hot water radiators) and I don't have different regions. Even though this thermostat has a lot of different connections possible, it still worked when I hooked up the wires. I have had nice heat, staying within the set limits, for a few weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: I Like to Do Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Did not work well, poor temperature control, shut off randomly or failed to shut off. I had a similar Hunter for about 10 years, this one just did not cut it.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of this model to replace an old 44260. The problem with all 3 is that if you use the temporary override feature with the temperature buttons, you wind up permanently changing the temperature setting for that program. Tired of having to reset programs each day. Also the span function does not work as discussed in the instruction book. Finally bought a model 44360 and it works as is should, although it has more features that I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and it tried to run the heating and cooling system at the same time. Had a tech come out and had to buy a whole new thermostat to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alicen

customer_reviews.title: Does what it wants to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one as a replacement for my other Hunter Thermostat, and finally installed it today and wouldn't you know it, it doesn't work and my Return window closed on Jul 17, 2017. What a bummer. It will not stay at a set temp, it basically does what it wants to, so I put my old one back up till I can find one that will work......I don't know if we got a defective one, but this thermostat does not stick to the settings we programmed into it.
customer_reviews.author: Haawwkeye

customer_reviews.title: Replacement time
customer_reviews.text: We been using the same model for ages and forgot what happen to the original unit that we had to replace but it gave us such great service and decided to replace like for like. Much easier thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold temp
customer_reviews.text: On temp hold. Temp will not hold on this model. It will revert back to factory temp program and bypass your hold temp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, program and use. It's had a few minor glitches but works well for the price. It's convenient and economical to have the temperature automatically adjust at certain times of the day. Instructions are easy to follow and the typical non-electrician can install it.
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: replaced in a snap
customer_reviews.text: Had an older Hunter thermostat that had stopped working and wanted to just do a quick and easy fix. The back plates were the same so all I had to do was swap out the front plate. I didn't have to change wires. Made the fix easy-peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already use product
customer_reviews.text: Did not know I was getting an open package and use product. Would have went to my local Home Depot instead had I known it would’ve been already used
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Have had nothing but issues with this and it’s the replacement it’s worse than the first one the temp is never correct and it jumps all over the place unacceptable
customer_reviews.author: lalalamb

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Programmable Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because WE are moving I and wanted to remove the Ecobee 4 that I had installed earlier this year for the new house.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bobrowski

customer_reviews.title: Using in my RV instead of the cheap bimetal type
customer_reviews.text: I removed the cheap RV Bimetal no real indicator thermostat. I also first switch a small 12 auto relay to operate the furnace so as not to pass to much DC current through the new thermo.
customer_reviews.author: K O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Temperature reading is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The primary function of a thermostat is to regulate the room temperature. Since this item fails to correctly register the room temperature by sometimes 3 degrees, it's not performing the basics of calling for heat or stoping it either.
customer_reviews.author: G. Burford

customer_reviews.title: Can’t put a good product down
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace the the same unit in my trailer. The one I had was still good. Can’t put a good product down. I’ll keep this one if I need it for later or someone else needs a thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: CFM Jr.

customer_reviews.title: does not function as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: there is no temporary setting. Any adjustments at the thermostat sets the current program. annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Talarico

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my RV, and it works great! Hunter should contact RV makers and sell them this product - it's far superior to any I've seen made for RVs. The setback option is ideal, hold temp works for the winter (I had a previous model in my previous RV).
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Temperature reading
customer_reviews.text: Dislike: The temperature reading was off by 2 degrees. This was checked against 4 official thermometers that were in agreement. . The replacement had the same problem. (bad batch). I want my money back!!!!! This notice wrongly says I requested a replacement. Wrong!!! Likes: Otherwise it is a good unit, but a little hard to program.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the headache
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions to the letter and my thermostat still wont work properly. First nite I installed it I set it at 78, and yes it qas on the hold override my ac ran all night and in the morning it was at 66 degrees! Would not shut off no matter how high the temp was. SMH
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: great thermostat for the money
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a house, and needed a new thermostat. After looking and reading some reviews I decided on this one. Easy to install, and easy to program. nice to have the weekday programmed out for when im at work and home, and the weekend being separate is nice. Worth the money, worked with my hot water heater furnace system, (two wire, white and black). Here's hoping to a more energy efficient bill.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Programmable Thermostat that doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst products I ever purchased! Did not stop running when temperature settings were reached and constantly lost the programmed settings. Called their support and they told me a technician would call me back and never did. Bought an Emerson and haven't had an issue since.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Savaryn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Our A/C heater thermostat went out on us and this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Half the time it works great, the other times that has a mind of its own. Just the other day it decided to turn the temperature up to 85 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Eddinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV!
customer_reviews.text: Utilizing this in my fifth wheel camper, this is one of very few with an adjustable span setting. Using this to keep the furnace from cycling excessively. With the span setting at three the furnace is operating as it should and does not cycle mor than once an hour! This is exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: LogicalOne

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from Hunter
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat cannot be programed. We have followed the directions in the manual and those on the thermostat (which are different), and reset the thermostat multiple times. We called tech support and left our contact information and never received a call back. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Harold S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hunter thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my HVAC system. House toasty all winter and cool in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Hoopengardner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tell time defect
customer_reviews.text: I set this up easy to install, will not clip backinto place the time is incorrect it ran a 1/2 fast this unit must be defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We like to keep our heat on 65
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if we got a defective one, but this thermostat does not stick to the settings we programmed into it. We like to keep our heat on 65, and lower it when we're not home. A couple of times we've heard the burner constantly on and checked it, and it was set to 69 degrees. Other times it has been off altogether. We will be returning this for a different thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Good Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Works good and was compatible with my old one that lasted 8 years, it is a little hard to program but otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Utz

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install & far better than the poor quality one that came with my travel trailer
customer_reviews.author: Hank Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Great & simple product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. The 1st lasted me 10 yrs. & I bought at a discount because the package was opened & taped back up at Wal-mart.
customer_reviews.author: Hooch

customer_reviews.title: Termporary override does not work
customer_reviews.text: When I try to temporarily override the set program, it permanently changes the program. When I press up or down to change the temperature, it will change the program for the entire time slot to the new temperature. So if I change a 12-5 program from say 60 to 70 with just using the up button, tomorrow from 12-5 it will be programmed to 70. It's almost like having a manual thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, except it only functions properly with a HVAC ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine, except it only functions properly with a HVAC that has a heat pump, otherwise it won't allow separate control of heat and AC. Should have warning on label.
customer_reviews.author: Manvessel

customer_reviews.title: good for manual only not programming would not buy
customer_reviews.text: ordered this as I had used this thermostat before. The first one I got when you over ride the program it did it permanently instead of temporally. Sent it back got another one same thing I already have two in use and they work fine do not think it is me, but decided before I sent it back to call Hunter tech support have been on hold for 1 hour and 10 minuets. So I would not buy this product unless you want to just manually control the heat or ac.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Works but makes noise.
customer_reviews.text: It works but makes a high pitched squeal when I change the temperature. The screen lights up and it seems to be associated with it being on.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyesMN

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced the same unit that I purchased 10 years ago. Any glitches in the 10-year old unit have been remedied. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Junk, don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: Defective, won’t hold the set temperature. We have two older versions of this same model and they are fine. QC is bad on the new ones or they are counterfeit. We got 2/2 bad ones from Amazon in late September 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: We believe that this may be a knock off since we have owned great Hunter brand thermostats in the past
customer_reviews.text: After months of thinking my spouse had changed the thermostat and he thinking that I had, we experimented to figure out this problem. We have come to the conclusion that this is not a programmable thermostat and doesn't even work as a manual thermostat. It daily changes temperatures even when every program is set to 70 degrees. Wish I could return it. We believe that this may be a knock off since we have owned great Hunter brand thermostats in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up, Easy to program, Easy to use, and never fails us. The filter indicator as well as the battery indicator are great. I love this little box!!
customer_reviews.author: H.Howard

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply ! I could do it . Lol
customer_reviews.author: Bar

customer_reviews.title: unreliable
customer_reviews.text: every Wednesday at midnight, it resets the temperature to 59F, both in program mode and in HOLD mode.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to replace an older version of the same model that went out after 11 years. It's easy to program and I like the look and not having to see all of the buttons. The indigo light looks very sleek at night if you need to program it.
customer_reviews.author: John Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, sturdy mounting bracket, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Trout

customer_reviews.title: heater won t warm up. 72
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for heating and air. Before house would not warm up past 72. Now it gets to 80+. All this time thermostat was bad. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace one just like it in my shop. The old one had gotten moisture on the circuit board which made it difficult to change the temperature setting. The old one was 10 old.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service does not exist for this product
customer_reviews.text: Hunter no longer supports thermostats in their line; the company who took over support is rude and non helpful! The programmable feature of this thermostat does not work properly and I am returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat buzzes whenever the back light turns on. Doesn't seem to be regulating temperature correctly and the settings don't work right.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement thermostat
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect match for the thermostat we needed to replace. Directions included were so easy to follow. Installing it took maybe ten minutes and was a lot cheaper than hiring a company to come out to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Hate to see this product phase of production
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting product on my second one for home 15yr mortgage
customer_reviews.author: James Wilson

customer_reviews.title: set temp is always one degree higher than actual temp ...
customer_reviews.text: set temp is always one degree higher than actual temp . should be the same. last hunter t stat was dead on but after 10 years display died
customer_reviews.author: banned

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to program and easy to adjust the programming
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to program and easy to adjust the programming. Installation was a breeze. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Medieval Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent programmable thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent programmable thermostat. Bought this as a replacement for one that finally died. Easy to program and back light is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: I've had issues with this thermostat the last few months ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had issues with this thermostat the last few months. No matter what I set the temperature to, it seems to change the setting all the time. Go to bed with it set at 62 and wake up at 8am sweating to death with the temp at 69.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No issues with installation or programming, It was a replacement of an older version where the buttons were sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far it works very well as a replacement. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it works very well as a replacement. Had this in my other home and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Is it possible to rate zero stars? This thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible to rate zero stars? This thing DOES NOT WORK! This is the replacement one b/c the first one did not work. It does not hold the programming and runs whatever schedule it wants to.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: We installed this a week ago. It worked great for the ac, but it stopped working when we switched it to the heater.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Crawley

customer_reviews.title: I like this one
customer_reviews.text: I like this one. It's programmable, has an adjustable span, has a temporary and permanent hold option, and doesn't have a very loud "click" when it turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa_S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat did not work. I have this same thermostat for another zone, but after reading other reviews it appears that they changed how its made. I did not purchase a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable inexpensive thermostat. I've had one of these in my house for almost ten years, still works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time, Hunter used to make great thermostats but now they should stick with making blinds
customer_reviews.author: Britcanuck

customer_reviews.title: Really like this thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Really like this thermostat. Easy to read and use. Been using for 3 months with both AC and Heat. Reliable performance.
customer_reviews.author: T-n-T Handywork

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation easy to use and works very well. We use it for our fireplace propane insert.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Parini

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my RV as well....
customer_reviews.text: Loved the one I had in the house so much, was thrilled to find out it would work in my RV as well, so I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great and good value for the price. I installed it in my 5th wheel and couldn't be happier. Love the backlight and dwelll settings. Has to install a micro switch to control my fan speed but otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: STD

customer_reviews.title: Energy Star LIE IT IS NOT 2 to 3 degrees off on room temp seems to run all the time not like my other one
customer_reviews.text: said Certification: Energy Star LIE IT IS NOT 2 to 3 degrees off on room temp seems to run all the time not like my other one did
customer_reviews.author: uxbridge6

customer_reviews.title: Not a good Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Display is easy to read and functions are easy to use. As stated by other, when heat is turn on, thermostat will NOT kick off. Heat will not turn off until thermostat is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Riptide

customer_reviews.title: ... thermostat that can be programmed while setting in your easy chair and it is very inexpensive with up to ...
customer_reviews.text: This very reliable programmable thermostat that can be programmed while setting in your easy chair and it is very inexpensive with up to 4 separate programs for each day..
customer_reviews.author: Roger Irving

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk dont waste you time with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had one of these and never had a problem ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these and never had a problem out of it. So when we bought a new house, I decided to buy one to install there.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have used these thermostats for several years in many different locations and they work great. I have never had any issue.
customer_reviews.author: buzz66boy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to set up, easy to install. Has good instructions even for two wire install.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Next time I am going to purchase a better one.
customer_reviews.text: these only seem to last a few years. Next time I am going to purchase a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Mackrel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the money , you can't go wrong with Hunter products
customer_reviews.author: PC MEDIC

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fully programmable features. Easy to program, and once you've set it up, you'll never have to touch it again!
customer_reviews.author: David Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Able to program temperatures for different times ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Able to program temperatures for different times of day which has helped lower the electric bill. Also looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the one I originally bought 10 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, great price, and easy to program!
customer_reviews.author: T Lady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great now that I am in the winter season. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cherman

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermostat because simply because of the blue backlight. It was identical to the one I already had except mine did not have a backlight and it was not programmable. I tried it for a few days but no matter how we set it, it kept doing its own thing and changing the temperature. My son is very mechanically inclined, so when he couldn't get it to work properly, I knew it was either defective or a really bad product. I ended up returning this thermostat and ordering PRO1 IAQ T701 (non-programmable) instead. The PRO model is excellent! It works perfectly, and I now have the blue backlight that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: vegasgal

customer_reviews.title: easy programming
customer_reviews.text: If you need just 4 setpoints per day, this is the thermostat to get. Very easy to set up and modify.
customer_reviews.author: netman

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very easy to install. Holds temp to 1 degree of set point compared to my old round one that fluctuated by up to 3 or 4 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and program...and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: ben moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just great in the camper & you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective the heat feature did not work n did become aware of problem till it was beyond return eligibility.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with thermostat, works great, and got it for a good price !!!
customer_reviews.author: JEFF WYMAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and program
customer_reviews.text: This thermostat has high end features for a low end price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The heater will not stop running. I had the Heat set for 70 degrees, it never shut off! I manually turned it off when it reached 80 degrees. Called my electrician and told him the brand i purchased, he said that this particular brand has a low success rate of working properly. He suggested a Honeywell brand. I installed the honey well and now everything works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: movie collector

customer_reviews.title: No good. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one. It also failed. Finally replaced with better brand Honeywell.
customer_reviews.author: Clev Family

customer_reviews.text: Not work to good turn on and after 10 second turn off

product_meta.title: Hunter 44157 - 5/2-Day Digital Programmable Thermostat (Home Thermostat, AC, Heat)
product_meta.description: Hunter Home Comfort Fans 5/2 Day Programmable Thermostat comes pre-programmed with easy to change presets for the weekdays and weekend and manual or vacation override. It features four programmable periods a day, allowing settings for wake, leave, return and sleep and provides accuracy for precise, comfortable temperature control. Default display mode is Fahrenheit but can be changed to Celsius. The option of using the pre-programmed settings, can save money by optimizing energy usage in heating and cooling throughout your home. Hunter 44157 Thermostat also features an INDIGLO Night-Light as a backlight that displays for easy viewing in the dark. Hunter 44157 - Universal 5/2-Day Programmable Thermostat will provide years of reliable service and year-round energy savings! Includes two #8 slotted screws and two wall anchors for mounting. Two AA batteries are required but are not included with purchase (sold separately). 1 Year Limited Warranty.
feature_bullets: Universally compatible with most furnaces and cooling systems
Low battery and filter change monitor
